Improvements.Improvement: Use enhanced for loop instead of traditional for loop
Improvements.Description: Instead of using a traditional for loop to iterate over the `styles` list, use an enhanced for loop. This makes the code more readable and reduces the chance of off-by-one errors.

Improvements.Improvement: Use else-if construct instead of multiple if statements
Improvements.Description: The multiple if statements can be replaced with an else-if construct, which makes the code more readable and organized, and reduces unnecessary checks.
